titles.title: Pregnancy Assistance Fund Expansion Act
A bill to amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to authorize additional funding for the pregnancy assistance fund.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
1/21/2015--Introduced. Pregnancy Assistance Fund Expansion Act
This bill amends the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to authorize additional funding for FY2016-FY2019 for the Pregnancy Assistance Fund for grants to states to assist pregnant and parenting teens and women.
